thread.title: Computer Cable Store now recognized as Google Trusted Store
thread.title_full: Computer Cable Store now recognized as Google Trusted Store

author: admin
title: Computer Cable Store now recognized as Google Trusted Store
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Computer Cable Store 
QUAKERTOWN, Pa., Sept. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Computer Cable Store , a leading company in computer cables and connectivity solutions, has been selected to be part of Google Trusted Stores program. Google Trusted Store badge was awarded to Computer Cable Store for their top-notch online shopping experience enjoyed by their customers. To be awarded the badge, the company must demonstrate a track record of timely shipping and exceptional customer service. When a visitor clicks on the Computer Cable Stores, they will be able to see a Google Trusted Store badge and by clicking on it, they will be able to view more information. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150910/265505LOGO 
`We are excited to be recognized and be awarded a Google Trusted Store badge because of our exceptional online shopping services that we are promising to continue and even make it better` said the company representative. `I take this opportunity to our ever hardworking staff who are committed to provide excellent shopping experience, and a Google Trusted Store badge is a well-deserved gift.` 
Customers will greatly benefit. As a result of this recognition they will have an option of selecting free purchase protection from Google. In an unlikely situation of a payment issue, they can seek Google`s assistance whereby they will work with Computer Cable Store and the shopper to address and solve the issue. As a result of this recognition, Google provides up to $1000 lifetime purchase protection for any qualified purchases. 
Google Trusted Stores is totally free for both the shoppers and online stores. The program assists online stores such as Company Cable Stores to draw new consumers, boost their sales and distinguish their exceptional services by having the badge in their website. 
Computer Cable Stores recently increased their return policy to 120 days from the previous 45 days. Shoppers have up to 120 days to return the commodities they were not satisfied with after the purchase. The 120 days return policy does not include the `P-` parts, which are the custom order, and they are not qualified to be returned. However, for substandard items, they can be returned after the 120 days elapses. The channel to be used for any items to be returned is either UPS or Federal Express for easy tracking by the company. 
Additionally, Computer Cable Store has no restock fees, and all in stock orders will be shipped out the same day they are ordered. All their cables have a lifetime warranty. 
Started in 2004 by George McDowell, Computer Cable Stores is a leader in providing computer cables and connectivity solutions to online shoppers and has an online store. The company has same day shipping policy and also has a 120 return policy for any package that is not a custom order. 
Media Contact: George McDowell, Computer Cable Store, 215-529-1560, gmcdowell@computercablestore.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com
